alert.note: Alert for Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 16 at 10:02PM EDT until July 17 at 4:33AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Housatonic River At Gaylordsville. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Flood stage. Water reaches New Milford Foundry and Youngfield Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:46 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 8.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 6.6 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.2 feet on 12/19/2000. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Gaylordsville Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Sun 6 pm: 8.1 Forecast: Mon 2 am 7.9 Mon 8 am 7.7 Mon 2 pm 7.6 Mon 8 pm 7.5 Tue 2 am 7.3 Tue 8 am 7.2 Tue 2 pm 7.1 Tue 8 pm 7.1 Wed 2 am 7.1 Wed 8 am 7.0 Wed 2 pm 6.8 &&
